properties.Name: Antioch Community Center
properties.Description: City hub for recreation, youth programs, classes, and community events.

properties.Name: Antioch Recreation Preschool Academy
properties.Description: City-run preschool offering early learning, social development, and structured programming.

properties.Name: City of Antioch Youth Sports Program
properties.Address: Various city fields and community facilities
properties.Description: Low-cost youth leagues and sports instruction supporting skill-building and teamwork.

properties.Name: Antioch Youth Sports Summer Camp
properties.Description: Seasonal multi-sport camp introducing youth to a variety of athletics and activities.

properties.Name: Antioch Youth Sports Complex (AYSC)
properties.Description: Large outdoor sports complex dedicated to providing safe, affordable athletic spaces for youth.

properties.Name: Antioch Little League Fields
properties.Description: Local Little League facility where children play baseball and gather for community events.

properties.Name: Antioch Community Park Sports Complex
properties.Description: City athletic complex with turf soccer fields, baseball fields, and youth sports programming.

properties.Name: Harbour Park
properties.Address: Harbour Dr & Hidden Glen Dr, Antioch, CA
properties.Description: Family-friendly park featuring a playground, softball fields, tennis courts, and picnic areas.

properties.Name: Contra Loma Regional Park
properties.Description: Large recreational lake park used by families for outdoor activities, swimming, hiking, and youth recreation.

properties.Name: Antioch Water Park
properties.Description: City-run water park offering pools, slides, and seasonal youth programs.

properties.Name: Antioch Public Library
properties.Description: Public library offering youth programming, homework support, reading groups, and community events.

properties.Name: Youth Arts Connection (Library Teen Program)
properties.Description: Creative youth space offering free workshops in poetry, music, spoken word, games, and community building.

properties.Name: Youth Services Network (YSN Office)
properties.Description: City-operated resource hub supporting youth ages 13–26 with programs, guidance, and community-building.

properties.Name: Boys & Girls Club of Contra Costa – Antioch Clubhouse
properties.Description: After-school and summer youth clubhouse providing mentoring, recreation, and safe community space.

properties.Name: Antioch High School
properties.Description: Community landmark offering athletics, clubs, and programs that shape youth life in Antioch.
